name: Natur - the forest is alive
description:
"Natur - The forest is alive" is a game about the journey of Natur, a little creature which was originated by the Nature and which has the ability to use Arcane Magic.

During its journey, Natur needs to use the Arcane Magic to awake the hidden power of the Old Runes and unleash powerful skills.

Natur's mission is to save Mother Nature.

This is as top-down adventure/explorer game.

Controls

"WASD" to move

Left Mouse Button to Attack

Spacebar to drop the Thunder rune

Shoot the Thunder Rune to summon a lightning bolt

Touch the Thunder Tune to collect it again to re-use it

Objective

Clear all monster on every scenario in order to proceed

Use the minimap to know where the monster are, and where the portal to the next level will be
